upcomingEvents.title: TechPreneur Summit
upcomingEvents.description: Flagship summit bringing together aspiring entrepreneurs, industry experts, and investors to showcase innovative business models.

upcomingEvents.title: Illuminate Workshop
upcomingEvents.description: Interactive workshop designed to ignite entrepreneurial thinking with hands-on activities and case studies.

upcomingEvents.title: Startup Charcha
upcomingEvents.description: Open forum for students and budding entrepreneurs to discuss ideas, challenges, and opportunities in the startup ecosystem.

upcomingEvents.title: Startup Day Celebration: Workshop on AI Tools
upcomingEvents.description: Celebration event with a special workshop on leveraging AI tools for building effective business plans.

upcomingEvents.title: Pre-Conference Workshop: Data Vision
upcomingEvents.description: Workshop focusing on data-driven decision making and its role in entrepreneurship and innovation.

upcomingEvents.title: Industrial Visit to Incubation Centre
upcomingEvents.description: A practical exposure visit to a reputed incubation center to understand startup ecosystems and mentorship opportunities.

upcomingEvents.title: Coffee with Alumni: Season 2
upcomingEvents.description: Interactive alumni talk series where successful TCET graduates share their entrepreneurial journey over coffee.

upcomingEvents.title: Idea/Prototype EXPO
upcomingEvents.description: Showcasing innovative student ideas and prototypes with an opportunity to receive feedback from industry mentors.

upcomingEvents.title: National Level Idea Pitching Competition
upcomingEvents.description: Prestigious competition for innovators across India to pitch their startup ideas and win funding opportunities.

upcomingEvents.title: Startup Charcha (Even Semester)
upcomingEvents.description: Follow-up edition of Startup Charcha featuring panelists, mentors, and budding entrepreneurs.

pastEvents.title: Seminar on Entrepreneurial Aspects in Higher Technical Education
pastEvents.description: Seminar highlighting the role of entrepreneurship in technical education and career development.

pastEvents.title: MSME Idea Hackathon
pastEvents.description: Hackathon focused on innovative solutions for Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME) challenges.

pastEvents.title: AICTE-IIC Innovator Summit
pastEvents.description: Summit organized under AICTE-IIC showcasing innovations and entrepreneurial journeys of students.

pastEvents.title: Eureka Pitching Competition (Institute Round)
pastEvents.description: Institute-level round of the Eureka competition, where students pitch innovative startup ideas.

pastEvents.title: Entrepreneur Day Celebration
pastEvents.description: Celebrating entrepreneurial spirit with talks, networking sessions, and student idea showcases.
